tours.title: Welcome to AI Voter Personas: US 2024

steps.title: In this website you can: 1) See the clusters' positions across 51 questions from ANES 2024. 2) Respond a 10-question quiz and see which cluster fits you more. 3) Have a conversation with AI-generated personas from each cluster about politics.
steps.content: All the methodology and code is available.

steps.title: Explore the Clusters
steps.content: View 15 ideological clusters in 3D and 2D. Hover over each cluster to see demographics, vote shares, and policy positions.

steps.title: Respond a Quiz and Find Your Cluster
steps.content: Answer 10 questions to discover which cluster you belong to.

steps.title: Chat with an AI-Generated Voter Persona
steps.content: Each cluster is represented by a simulated persona based on real survey data. Ask them about political issues and see how different ideological groups respond.

steps.title: Methodology and Validation
steps.content: Learn about the clustering methodology, LLM validation experiments, and access the full technical documentation and code.
